sentences.sContent: The first accurate census, I think, is in Copenhagen at the end of the eighteenth century.
sentences.sContent_eng: The first accurate census, I think, is in Copenhagen at the end of the eighteenth century.
sentences.sCn: 我认为,第一次精确的人口普查,是在十八世纪末的哥本哈根

sentences.sContent: Indeed, arguably a modern military power, at least in the seventeenth and early eighteenth-century sense, and he injects European culture into Russia.
sentences.sContent_eng: Indeed, arguably a modern military power, at least in the seventeenth and early eighteenth-century sense, and he injects European culture into Russia.
sentences.sCn: 至少在十七世纪和十八世纪早期,它可以算是一个现代化的军事大国,同时 他将欧洲文化注入俄国

trans.tranCn: 第十八的，第十八个的；十八分之一的
